column4: I have all of my music collection stored on my server in a publicly-facing directory. Are there any easily installed programs that will allow me to create a form of online "radio" or something else that will let me play my music directly from a browser?
do you want to listen from outside the local network?
Yes, outside the local network. ie I'd like to be able to go to http://music.myserver.com or http://www.myserver.com:9000 or whatever
Will Ampache play from the browser, or just let you download?
